com.communote.server.service

Class UserPreferenceService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.service.UserPreferenceService

  • @Service
public class UserPreferenceService
extends Object
    Service for providing user preferences.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • getPreferences

        public <T extends UserPreference> T getPreferences(Class<T> preferencesType)
                                            throws AuthorizationException
        Method to load the given preferences for the current user.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Concrete type of the user preference.
        Parameters:
        preferencesType - Type of the preferences to load.
        Returns:
        The preferences. This will never return null.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the current user does not have access to the given preferences.

      • getPreferences

        public UserPreference getPreferences(String className)
                              throws AuthorizationException
        Method to load the given preferences for the current user.
        Parameters:
        className - Full qualified class name of the preferences.
        Returns:
        The preferences. This will never return null.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the current user does not have access to the given preferences.

      • getPreferencesAsJson

        public String getPreferencesAsJson()
        Returns:
        all stored preferences of the current user as JSON object. The JSON object will be empty if there are no preferences

      • getPreferencesAsJson

        public <T extends UserPreference> String getPreferencesAsJson(Class<T> preferencesType)
                                                       throws AuthorizationException
        Method to load the given preferences for the current user.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Concrete type of the user preference.
        Parameters:
        preferencesType - Type of the preferences to load.
        Returns:
        The preferences in JSON format.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the current user does not have access to the given preferences.

      • getPreferencesAsJson

        public <T extends UserPreference> String getPreferencesAsJson(String className)
                                                       throws AuthorizationException
        Method to load the given preferences for the current user.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Concrete type of the user preference.
        Parameters:
        className - Full qualified class name of the preferences.
        Returns:
        The preferences in JSON format.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the current user does not have access to the given preferences.

      • initialize

        @PostConstruct
public void initialize()
        Initializer method.

      • mergePreferences

        public void mergePreferences(String className,
                             Map<String,String> preferences)
                      throws NotFoundException,
                             AuthorizationException
        This method can be used to merge the given properties with already existing data.
        Parameters:
        className - Full qualified class name of the preferences.
        preferences - The preferences to merge.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - Thrown, when there is not type for the given class name registered.
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the current user doesn't have access to the preferences.

      • register

        public <T extends UserPreference> void register(Class<T> preferencesType)
        Register a new preference type to allow storing and loading of preferences of this type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Concrete type of the user preference.
        Parameters:
        preferencesType - The type to register.

      • removePreferences

        public <T extends UserPreference> void removePreferences(Class<T> preferencesType)
                                                  throws AuthorizationException
        Method to remove all values for the given preferences type from the current user.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Concrete type of the user preference.
        Parameters:
        preferencesType - The preference type.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to access the given preference.

      • storePreferences

        public void storePreferences(UserPreference preferences)
        Persists the given preferences.
        Parameters:
        preferences - The preferences to persist.

      • unregister

        public <T extends UserPreference> void unregister(Class<T> preferencesType)
        Method to unregister the type. This should be explicitly called, when a type shall be removed.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Concrete type of the user preference.
        Parameters:
        preferencesType - The type to remove.
